content: As an AI language model, I understand that the user is expressing the belief that the developers need to improve the RNG system in the game to make it more enjoyable and rewarding for everyone. The user may feel that a fair and balanced system is necessary to keep players interested and engaged, and that the current system is doing the opposite by frustrating and driving players away. The user seems to feel strongly that if the developers are unable or unwilling to make the necessary improvements, then they do not deserve to receive financial support from players.
